import { IonBackButton, IonButton, IonButtons, IonContent, IonFab, IonFabButton, IonHeader, IonIcon, IonInput, IonItem, IonLabel, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToast, IonToolbar } from '@ionic/react' import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Camera, CameraResultType } from '@capacitor/camera'; import { cameraOutline as cameraOutlineIcon, createOutline } from 'ionicons/icons'; const Profile: React.FC = ({ user, setuser }) => { return ( Profile
{user.name}
 ) } export default Profile
